oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Synthesis of spiro-indanes by cycloaddition strategy
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: KOTHA, S
MANIVANNAN, E
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: fenestranes
acetylenes
systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Various 2,2'-spirobiindane-1,3-dione derivatives which are useful precursors for the synthesis of unsymmetrical benzoannelated fenestranes are reported via [2+2+2] and [4+2] cycloaddition reactions as key steps.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF THE CHEMICAL SOCIETY-PERKIN TRANSACTIONS 1, (20), 2543-2547
